attributes.action: Replace Jeremy Hunt as Secretary of State for Health. He's a twit.
attributes.additional_details:
Please watch this video by James Rawson for more information https://www.facebook.com/dothejbox/videos/10101397847639533/ 
#notfairnotsafe
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt is running the National Health Service into the ground. His private interests are more important than that of the people he works for. His proposed contract for junior doctors will see them work longer hours than is safe, putting both their health and that of their patients at risk.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
